name: Brickstack
description:
A really stupid game where the goal is to stack as many bricks(or planks) on top of each other. The more bricks you have, the higher your score(my highscore is 67).

Note: the sound effects wil get better(just need to find some good programs), but the music probably is not going to change.

If you find any glitches or think of  other things to improve the game, please tell me!
